body.en-US:
##Greek Night at Mike's Restaurant

Enjoy your meal with Greek Dancers

**Dancing starts at 21:00**

Yes, it's true...

**FREE DRINKS ON MANOS!!!**

> Tonight from 19:00 until you can no longer stand up =)

Platanias coastal village: 4km
Chania centre: 17km
Chania centre bus station: 17km
Chania airport ( CHQ ) : 37km
Chania (Souda) Port: 29km
Rethymno town and port: 50km
Heraklion centre: 130km
Heraklion port: 130km
Heraklion airport ( HER ) : 130km
We'd love to hear your feedback or comments in relation to your stay at Mike Hotel & Apartments.

Reception (open 09h00-24h00)

Reception can assist with Car Rental , Bike Rental , Bicycle Rental , Excursions , Recommendations , Fax and 

Photocopier Services , Postage , Foreign Exchange, Doctor on Call, Iron and Ironing Board etc.

Wi-Fi is Free and is availlable at the Pool Bar and Lobby of the lower building

Internet Corner  ( extra charge ) 

Restaurant / tavern

Small Children's Playground

Housekeeping is daily , except Sundays

Linen ( Sheets and Towels - changed upon arrival and twice a week thereafter)

Late check-out facility ( if is possible ) 

Public washrooms and change rooms

Baby Cots are available

Check-in is at 13h00 and check-out at 12h00

Pool Bar

Free WiFi in Maleme Chania Free Internet Wi-Fi zone at the Pool Bar and the Reception of the Studios and Apartments and also at the Bar and the Restaurant at the Hotel .

The 174.40 sqm Swimming Pool ( maximum depth 3 meters ) is located in the lower building ( at the Studios and the Apartments ) , in front of the blissful Pool Bar and just Steps from the Beach. Surrounded by Sitting Areas , Sunbeds and Umbrellas ( complimentary for guest use ) , Palm Trees and well-kept Gardens , this is the perfect place to Relax , Swim , take in the sun while enjoying light music and a refreshment or snack from the Pool Bar . Near to this area, there are also Children's Toys in a small Play Area for the little ones to enjoy . The swimming pool also has a Children's Section (26.40 sqm) with maximum depth 0.60cm.

The Pool Bar at Mike Hotel & Apartments is located in the lower building and is set amongst Palm Trees and beautiful garden areas where sitting areas , sunbeds and umbrellas are provided for guests . Relaxing music blends well with the Splashing Pool Sounds and makes for a most enjoyable place to enjoy a Snack ,  Refreshment or a Coctail .

The Pool Bar is open daily from 09h30 till late and serves Pizzas , Toasted Sandwiches , Salads , Ice-creams , Coffees , Soft Drinks , Juices , Milkshakes , Wines, Beers and a Wide Variety of other Alcoholic Drinks and Cocktails .

At the Pool Bar and Nearby Lobby you will also find  Large Screens Satellite TV 's and  Free Wi-Fi internet Access .

Mike Hotel and Apartments provides  Buffet Breakfast , Lunch and Dinner at the Restaurant and located in the upper Hotel Building . This restaurant is open to all guests and has ample indoor and outdoor terrace seating which enjoys wonderful Sea Views.

Buffet Breakfast includes: breads , cookies , home-made marmalades , jams , honey , Greek yoghurt , milk , cereals , boiled eggs , ham , cheese , coffee , tea , hot chocolate ,  apple and orange juice and other seasonal goodies.

We also provide the optional breakfast from our a la carte menu such as a fine selection of eggs and bacon, continental breakfast, Greek yoghurt etc.

For Lunch and Dinner the restaurant offers traditional Cretan and Greek dishes (a la carte) where many of the Ingredients are Organically Home Grown at the 150 meter stretch of cultivated land which separates the Hotel building from the lower Studios Apartments building .To mention a few of these - Tomatoes , Cucumber , Zucchini , Peppers , Aubergines / eggplant , Potatoes , Watermelon , Parsley , Basil etc. Extra Virgin Organic Olive Oil , Tsikoudia - Raki and the House Wine are all from the owners farms .

The a la carte menu at the Restaurant includes Traditional Cretan Dishes ( Casserole and Oven) , Meat and Poultry dishes , Spaghetties  , Home-made Pizza 's , Omelets ,  Children's Dishes , Salads and Desserts .

***Special Dishes of the Day Vary  , Please do ask while Staying With Us .***

header.en-US: The upper Hotel building , Mike's Hotel

body.en-US: Consists of 14 units ( 4 Twin - Double  Rooms , 8 Triple Rooms-Twin2/3   and 2 Family Rooms ) .

header.en-US: Twin - Double Sea View Hotel Room

body.en-US:
(up to 2 people )

Each Double - Twin Sea View Hotel Room is an open plan room with twin beds joined together, bathroom with bathtub (with shower curtain) and a furnished balcony with Views to the Sea. All Rooms have  Individual Controlled Air Condition , TV , DVD Player , Mini - Fridge , Kettle , Hair Dryer , Telephone and Safety Deposit Box ( extra charge ) .

(up to 4 people)

Each Aartment has an open plan sitting area with 2 Single beds ,  kitchenette and a dining area. From there a closing door leads to a separate bedroom with twin beds joined togethe r. Bathrooms are either with shower or with bathtub (with shower curtain). Some Apartments have one furnished balcony while others have two . All Apartmants have Individual Controlled Air Conditioning , kichenette ( 2 eye stove head , extractor fan , Kettle , Toaster , Mini - Fridge , Crockery and Cutlery ) , TV , DVD Player , Hair Dryer , Telephone , and Safety Depsoit Box ( extra charge ) . 

All Apartments have either a Sea View, Side Sea View or a Garden View.

(up to 3 people)

Each Studio is an open plan room with twin beds joined together and an additional sofa bed/extra bed (to accommodate a 3rd person) , bathroom with a shower or with bathtub (with shower curtain) , kitchenette as well as either a furnished balcony or terrace . All Studios have Individually Controlled Air Conditioning , Kitchenette (2 eye stove head , extractor fan , Kettle, Toaster, Mini-fridge, Crockery and Cutlery) , TV , DVD Player, Telephone, Hair Dryer  and  Safe Deposit Box (extra charge ) .

All Studios have either a Sea View, Side Sea View or a Garden View.
Consists of 23 units (12 Studios and 11 Apartments) .

header.en-US: The lower building Mike's Studios and Apartments

body.en-US:
Mike Hotel and Apartments is located in the coastal village of Maleme , just 17km from Chania . The complex consists of an upper building , Mike's Hotel with the Restaurant and the Hotel Rooms and a lower building , Mike's Studios and Apartments with  the Studios -  Apartments , the Pool Bar and a uniquely shaped 174sqm Swimming Pool , with a children's section.

The Hotel Rooms have been refurbished in 2011 with dark wood furniture with clean lines adding to their classic style and offer a variety of room categories.

The Studios and Apartments in the lower building , with 2 elevators , with modern design , have a fresh and airy feel to them and are best suited to those who wish to be near the Swimming Pool and Sea . All these units have a kitchenette and views either to the sea or the well-kept gardens.

Separating these two complexes is a stretch of 150m of cultivated land . The owners  Organically Grow their own produce and use this in their restaurant.

Surrounded by palm trees and well-kept gardens, the Pool Bar and Swimming Pool area , just steps from Maleme's pebble Beach with lifeguard , are the ideal place at which you can relax , sunbathe and enjoy a refreshment.

Near  you will also find Beach Volley , Mini soccer , Tennis Court ,  Supermarket , Mini market , Car Rental , ATM , pharmacy , Doctor's Office , Bakery, Foreign Press Store , Restaurants , Bars and Cafes.

Mike Hotel and Apartments Chania is an ideal base from which to explore west Crete, its famed Beaches and archaeological historical sites from a short drive to Chania Hotel center and its old Venetian town makes for a wonderful visit . This is just the place to be if you are looking to relax , rejuvenate and enjoy sun-blessed Crete!    

 Tui 2011 ,  2012 and 2013 Awards
